episode_event_general_ch0106_10_kamitsur:
Guess what, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Pasio’s getting a fashion show organized by
yours truly! You should come check it out.

I can’t wait to see how
the stage turns out.

I absolutely live for the butterflies I get in my
stomach right before a fashion show.

I hope you get to experience the euphoria of
stepping out onto a catwalk someday, too.
There’s nothing like it!

Come on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s time to strut our stuff and
dazzle everyone we meet!

That was stunning,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You never fail to dazzle me
with your talent!
